name: Christmas Is Not Fun!
description:
A short christmas horror game that show how christmas is not fun.

Christmas themed horror game made in 2 days.

Can you collect 6 presents and bring it home?

Version: 1.1

Note: THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT, SO IF YOU FIND ANY BUG OR GLITCH PLEASE WRITE COMMENT.

Update:

-Fixed some glitches...

-Added version text to main menu.

Assets in the game are downloaded from:

1.Assest Store

2.SketchFab

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Space - Jump

Escape - Main

Don't forget to check my other indie games!

If you like my work you can donate me.
